title: Change Your Life with Cryptocurrency
sub-title: Change your life by taking the leap into Cryptocurrencies, NFT and DeFi
cardTitle: How can we help you get started?
card1: I am very new to crypto. I need someone to explain how this all works.
card2: I know the basics but I need to know the latest news that have an impact on crypto prices.
card3: I want to understand how each coin works and what is so special about it.
